title: Conflict Management Strategies Between Instructional Designers and Faculty

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and understanding of higher education environments
context.additional_context: A course analyzing conflict cases between instructional designers and faculty in asynchronous LMS-based learning environments and exploring resolution strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can classify three or more types of conflicts between instructional design and faculty in higher education settings
Learners can propose optimal communication strategies for specific situations based on conflict case analysis
Enhances practical conflict resolution skills through scenario writing and role-playing based on real-world cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
